data.actual_result: It says "Expired Invite", then when you click Cancel or hit your phone's Back button it instantly goes back to the join server screen, regardless of how much you hit Cancel or the Back button
data.short_description: Clicking on a Discord invite from the Internet makes you stuck on the screen to join that server
data.steps_to_repro: - Hit the 100 server limit - Search for any Discord Server on the Internet - Find an invite and click on it - Click Join Server
